ground_truth: Forrest runs across a cobblestone bridge with the Rocky Mountains in the distance and split rail fences line the road as he runs through some meadowland. Meanwhile three men in the barber shop watch the news on television and Jenny fills customer's coffee cups. Forrest continues running as a young man runs up to him and jogs behind him. as Forrest runs up a slope on a high mountain road with a group of people jogging behind him. The large group follows Forrest across the desert road through a small town where a man runs up and talks to him while a hippie stops to ponder a profound thought. A truck with a bumper sticker drives into an intersection and collides with a car. Forrest runs followed by his group as another man runs up to him. Forrest wipes his face on a towel and hands it back to the man who looks at the Tshirt. Forrest runs with a group that follows behind him until he stops and the group stops behind him. Forrest stands and looks as the group waits expectantly. then he turns and looks walks toward the group which parts for him as he walks down the middle of the road. A television shows President Reagan and his staff reacting to gunshots in front of a limo while Forrest sits eating a sandwich watching the news of the assassination attempt.
